free_text.Learning outcomes: This hands-on lab session (practical lab work / Travaux Pratiques - TP) is an integral component of VLSI design education, and it should be taken in the same semester (concurrently) with the course VLSI deisgn I and Hardware systems modeling I. In this practical lab session, the students will follow exercises in full-custom mask layout design, RTL / semi-custom design and automatic placement & routing, using state-of-the-art EDA (Electronic Design Automation) tools.

free_text.Objectifs d'apprentissage: This hands-on lab session (practical lab work / Travaux Pratiques - TP) is an integral component of VLSI design education, and it should be taken in the same semester (concurrently) with the course VLSI deisgn I and Hardware systems modeling I. In this practical lab session, the students will follow exercises in full-custom mask layout design, RTL / semi-custom design and automatic placement & routing, using state-of-the-art EDA (Electronic Design Automation) tools.
